lead_paragraph: A senior U.S. military commander on Sunday praised Iraqi forces fighting to recapture the northern city of Mosul from the Islamic State group, saying they were "at their peak" and adjusting well to changing realities on the battlefield.
snippet: A senior U.S. military commander on Sunday praised Iraqi forces fighting to recapture the northern city of Mosul from the Islamic State group, saying they were "at their peak" and adjusting well to changing realities on the battlefield....

headline.main: US General Praises Iraqi Forces Fighting in Mosul
headline.print_headline: US General Praises Iraqi Forces Fighting in Mosul
